description: Number of partitions of an n-set into blocks of size >4.
references: E. A. Enneking and J. C. Ahuja, Generalized Bell numbers, Fib. Quart., 14 (1976), 67-73.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
mathematica: max = 27; CoefficientList[ Series[ Exp[ Exp[x] - Normal[ Series[ Exp[x], {x, 0, 4}]]], {x, 0, max}], x]*Range[0, max]!(* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Apr 25 2012, from e.g.f. *)
author: Steven C. Fairgrieve (fsteven(AT)math.wvu.edu), Nov 06 2000
